comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Mr. and Mrs. Marshall Jenkins and family of Lebanon, Conn., are in the city visiting friends and relatives. Mrs. Jenkins is the former Thelma Conoly, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. G.W. Conoly of south Bronough street. Left to right, Mr. Jenkins, Marsha Lynette, 6; Laura, 4; Mrs. Jenkins, and Derrick, 11 months. Mr. Jenkins is a former principal of Lake McBride Junior High School, and is now principal of Lyman Memorial High School in Lebanon."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
